verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> an <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> with a <S%H632>bond;<s%> he shall not <S%H2490>break<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

If a <S%H802>woman<s%> also <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H631>bind<s%> herself by a <S%H632>bond,<s%> being in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in her <S%H5271>youth;<s%>

And her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> her <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and her <S%H632>bond<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and her <S%H1>father<s%> shall <S%H2790>hold<s%> his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her; then <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>bond<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallow<s%> her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>hears;<s%> not <S%H3605>any<s%> of her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or of her <S%H632>bonds<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her, <S%H3588>because<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her.

And <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H1961>had<s%> at all an <S%H376>husband,<s%> when she <S%H5088>vowed,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4008>uttered<s%> ought out of her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and <S%H2790>held<s%> his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> it: then her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and her <S%H632>bonds<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> it; then he shall make her <S%H5088>vow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H5088>vowed,<s%> and that which she <S%H4008>uttered<s%> with her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> of <S%H6565>none<s%> <S%H6565>effect:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

But every <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H490>widow,<s%> and of her that is <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H631>bound<s%> their <S%H5315>souls,<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her.
And <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> in her <S%H376>husband's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> by a <S%H632>bond<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath;<s%>

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and <S%H2790>held<s%> his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her, and <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her not: then <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>bond<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> has utterly made them <S%H6565>void<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them; then <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H4161>proceeded<s%> out of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> concerning her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or concerning the <S%H632>bond<s%> of her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand:<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> has made them <S%H6565>void;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>binding<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> may <S%H6965>establish<s%> it, or her <S%H376>husband<s%> may make it <S%H6565>void.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> altogether <S%H2790>hold<s%> his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day;<s%> then he <S%H6965>establishes<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H632>bonds,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on her: he <S%H6965>confirms<s%> them, <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2790>held<s%> his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
But <S%H518>if<s%> he shall any ways make them <S%H6565>void<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> them; then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> being yet in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
